snippet: The Central Park concert by the Fania All Stars that was to have closed SummerStage on Aug. 24 will be replaced by a dance party.
abstract: The Central Park concert by the Fania All Stars that was to have closed SummerStage on Aug. 24 will be replaced by a dance party.

headline.main: Fania All Stars Concert in Central Park Is Canceled
headline.print_headline: Fania All Stars Concert in Park Is Canceled
